name: John COZZONE, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent

parties: John COZZONE, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of September, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
957 A.2d 231
John COZZONE, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.
No. 83 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 24, 2008.
